template: Hi {patient.firstName}, on a scale of 1-10, would you recommend Dr {doctor.lastName} to a friend or family member? 1 = Would not recommend, 10 = Would strongly recommend
Thank you. You were diagnosed with {diagnosis.name}. Did Dr {doctor.lastName} explain how to manage this diagnosis in a way you could understand?
We appreciate the feedback, one last question: how do you feel about being diagnosed with {diagnosis.name}?
